pages.text: $(li)The Totem of Void Undying is the improved version of the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/totem_of_undying)Totem of Undying$(/l).$(br)$(li)It will resurect and teleport you on the nearest surface if you die in the void.
$(li)To save space in your inventory, it can be equipped within the Charm slot in the Curios API menu.
